name: Heavy Hitter
description: Deal more damage with heavy items.

name: Conflict Resolver
description: A shocking response to taking damage.

name: Aggressive
description: Break hits deal more damage!

name: Swing for the Fences
description: Knock enemies back further, and deal more damage when they bonk into walls.

name: Large & In Charge
description: Go big or go under.

name: Beta Tester
description: Using apps creates an electric shock.

name: Open Minded
description: Higher chance of critting while unfocused.

name: Eclaire-as-a-Service
description: Sniff out important objects in the room!

name: Upper Body Strength
description: Now I'm a jerk, and everybody loves me!

name: People Person
description: Gain strength when more people are nearby.

name: Beggar Queen
description: Hit harder, but find less money. +2 damage.

name: Phone Addict
description: Apps are more common!

name: Self-Starter
description: Deal double damage briefly at the start of battle.

name: Fiery Glare
description: Occasionally ignite enemies you focus on.

name: Move Fast and Break Things
description: Move faster the more objects you break.

name: Hard Headed
description: Dodge rolls deal damage.

name: Yeet!
description: That's all she yote.

name: Trailblazer
description: Dodge rolling ignites the ground behind you.

name: Free Hand
description: Two handed weapons are wielded like one handed weapons.

name: Sword Mastery
description: Charge attacking with sharp weapons launches a laser.

name: Spear Header
description: Deal bonus damage with the very tip of a spear.

name: Pickup Artist
description: Your critical hits charm enemies.

name: Over-Protective
description: Lose a heart container, and gain 4 armor.

name: Loaded for Bear
description: Guns fire faster and have twice as much ammo.

name: Personal Cloud
description: Stores more data than anyone knows what to do with!

name: Disaster-Proof
description: You are unaffected by fire, ice, and electricity.

name: Win Friends & Influence Monsters
description: A chance that the last enemy in a combat joins you.

name: Power User
description: Use apps an additional time.

name: Cold Shoulder
description: Taking armor damage freezes all enemies.

name: Hot Shot
description: Thrown items will automatically ignite.

name: Team Player
description: When you would take damage, your allies will take it instead.

name: Chilling Glare
description: Occasionally freeze enemies you focus on.

name: Explosive Temper
description: Seriously, I'm at my limit...

name: On The Clock
description: Slow down your enemies when you barely dodge their attacks.

name: Digital Nomad
description: Gain a random app every few rooms.

name: Hot-headed
description: After killing an enemy with a charged attack, light nearby enemies on fire.

name: Crushin' It
description: Club weapons crush through armor.

name: Downsized
description: I'm Baby

name: Emotive
description: Supportive reacts only

name: Cold Caller
description: Thrown items have a chance to freeze enemies.

name: Chumpette
description: A girl's best friend!

name: Thought Leader
description: Occasionally charm an enemy you focus on.

name: Perfectionist
description: Gain bonus damage on each floor until you're hit.

name: Lower Body Strength
description: Nothing stuns you anymore.

name: Party Animal
description: Gain ping pong balls when you're unarmed.

name: Fake It Til You Make It
description: Start each room disguised.
image: Fake It Til You Make It.png

name: Buzzkill
description: A high chance to crit healthy enemies.

name: Fragile Ego
description: Deal more damage, but items break more easily.

name: Action-Oriented
description: If you face away from explosions, they're stronger and don't hurt you.

name: Halt and Catch Fire
description: Knocking down enemies ignites them.

name: The Best Defense
description: If you have none, gain armor from breaking an enemy's armor.

name: Blood Money
description: Don't have the cash? You can always...

name: Purchase Protection
description: Gain armor whenever you buy something worth $10 or more.

name: Ice Breaker
description: Break hits have a chance to freeze enemies.

name: Short Term Invester
description: Invest all of your cash and get it back next floor... with interest!

name: Volatile
description: Things are about to pop off.

name: Cash Injection
description: Picking up money grants you temporary strength.

name: Financial Gains
description: Your strength is tied to your wallet.

name: Good Consumer
description: Eating bricked phones gains armor.

name: Aggro Crab's Blessing
description: Chance to bless a room upon entry.

name: Bridge Burner
description: Fire deals double damage. Burn it all down!

name: The Cleaner
description: Time to take out the trash.

name: Keep it Simple, Stupid
description: Do more damage when carrying multiple copies of the same item.

name: Sweat Equity
description: Picking up money causes nearby enemies to slip.

name: Thick Skin
description: Projectiles bounce off of you.

name: Friends in High Places
description: Death from above!

name: Time is Money
description: Earn double money, but lose it over time.

name: Noncommittal
description: Avoid damage if you get hit while charging an attack.

name: Hot Friends
description: Burning enemies will be charmed to your side.

name: Deep Pockets
description: Carry more stuff. And I mean like, WAY more stuff.

name: Recruiter
description: Interact with enemies to purchase their souls.

name: Wear Many Hats
description: The more hats you wear, the stronger you are.

name: Vertically Integrated
description: Going... Over?

name: Aggro Pal
description: This oughta crab their attention!

name: Room for Growth
description: Gain an empty heart.

name: Cubicle Rewards Member
description: Opening crates earns extra cash.

name: Pugilist
description: Punch above your weight!

name: Disruptive
description: Your critical hits electrocute enemies.

name: Scrappy
description: Deal extra damage with junk items.

name: Clap Back
description: After taking damage, knock down nearby enemies.

name: Retaliatory
description: Deal double damage briefly after being hit.

name: Composed
description: Stay invincible for much longer after being hit.

name: Resourceful
description: Cubicle boxes contain an extra item.

name: Go-Getter
description: Move and attack faster.

name: Penny Puncher
description: Your first crit against an enemy will earn you a buck or two. Crit Chance Up 10%

name: Bloodsucker
description: Low chance to heal when you defeat an enemy.

name: Bomb Dropper
description: Let em' have it!

name: Intimidating
description: Chance to knock down enemies upon entering a room.

name: She Don't Miss
description: All your thrown items are homing.

name: Charismatic
description: Gain a small discount at all shops.

name: Agile
description: Faster iteration time AND faster dodge rolls!

name: Vindictive
description: Regain lost health by quickly defeating the last monster that hurt you.

name: Scaled Up
description: Big business just got bigger. +1 damage.

name: Stress Eater
description: Eating food increases your strength for a bit.

name: Good Under Pressure
description: Improved crit chance at low health.

name: Fail Forward
description: Come back from defeat stronger than before!

name: Exit Strategist
description: Exiting a crawl explodes whatever you were under.

name: Defensive
description: Overhealing grants armor!

name: Unapproachable
description: The best defense against unwanted conversation.
